channel.title: My list of good stuff. [shareware and freeware]
channel.description:
I saw that post "ultimate list of what you should have on your computer" so i decided to make my own with many usefull programs.
First of all a good webbrowser. i highly recoomend firefox, because oits much more secure than IE. IE gave me 14 pieces of spyware and firefox never gave me a single on. http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/ Then install some addons to make it like 100 times better https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/
Now for anti virus and anti spyware, there i highly Recoomend, AVG free aniti virus updated offen http://free.grisoft.com/doc/1 ad-aware anity spyware not updated so offen but its great and kill it all. http://www.lavasoftusa.com/products/ad-aware_se_personal.php nod32 [shareware] the greatest scanner updates 10 times a day,or like, and find and kill all treats. http://www.eset.com/
Now for some offen used and usefull programs
adobe reader. for use with pdf files http://www.download.com/3000-2378-10000062.html
hypercam and hypersnap [shareware] best picture taker ever and a pretty good screen recorder. http://www.hyperionics.com/
alienguise very nice theme mamager and comes with some free nice themes. you can also buy some skins from the official website. http://www.alienware.com/intro_pages/invader.aspx
nero 7 premium reloaded [shareware] superb burning program, got virtual drives can make dics images and much more. http://www.nero.com/eng/index.html
alcohol 120% [shareware] super dics image mamager. it burns many kind of pictures to dics and have 30 virtual drives. realy good. http://www.alcohol-soft.com/
µtorrent probardly the best bittorrent client ive ever used. http://www.utorrent.com/
CCleaner super register cleaner, cleans not used icon broken dll and alot more. very usefull. cleaned more than 1gig dumb on my old pc. http://www.ccleaner.com/
Star download free and buy ver very good download manager, i use it all the time. it split the file you download and download them all at once makes download way faster. http://www.stardownloader.com/downloads.php
WinRAR [shareware] probardly the best archive program, that can open and extract rar files. i highly recommend http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm
That's all i got or now. please comment and tell me if you like any of the programs.
Also post some usefull programs your self if you fell like.

item.title: My list of good stuff. [shareware and freeware]
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

I saw that post “ultimate list of what you should have on your computer” so i decided to make my own with many usefull programs.

First of all a good webbrowser.
i highly recoomend firefox, because oits much more secure than IE. IE gave me 14 pieces of spyware and firefox never gave me a single on.

Mozilla

Internet for people, not profit

Mozilla is the not-for-profit behind the lightning fast Firefox browser. We put people over profit to give everyone more power online.


Then install some addons to make it like 100 times better
addons.mozilla.org

Add-ons for Firefox (en-US)

Download Firefox extensions and themes. They’re like apps for your browser. They can block annoying ads, protect passwords, change browser appearance, and more.

Now for anti virus and anti spyware, there i highly Recoomend,
AVG free aniti virus
updated offen
http://free.grisoft.com/doc/1
ad-aware anity spyware
not updated so offen but its great and kill it all.

Adaware

adaware: the best FREE Antivirus & Ad Blocker period.

adaware is the Internet’s security and privacy leader. We offer simple, worry-free solutions that enhance your online experience, keeping you connected like never before.

updates 10 times a day,or like, and find and kill all treats.

CCleaner super register cleaner, cleans not used icon broken dll and alot more. very usefull. cleaned more than 1gig dumb on my old pc.

Star download free and buy ver very good download manager, i use it all the time. it split the file you download and download them all at once makes download way faster.

WinRAR [shareware] probardly the best archive program, that can open and extract rar files. i highly recommend
